scripts.build:container: SEMVER=$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") && SHORT_HASH=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) && podman build --platform linux/amd64 -f Dockerfile -t ghcr.io/oa-labs/arcai-web-backend:${SEMVER}-${SHORT_HASH} ..
scripts.push:container: SEMVER=$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") && SHORT_HASH=$(git rev-parse --short HEAD) && podman push -q ghcr.io/oa-labs/arcai-web-backend:${SEMVER}-${SHORT_HASH}
